domain.name: Entertainment Personality
domain.description: An entertainment personality in the world, like Anderson Cooper or Miranda Sings

text:
People shouldn't mistake criticism of the Govt during this crisis, however harsh, as a lack of desire for the Govt to win this #coronavirus war.
We're all on the same side, we all have a common enemy. 
It's how we wage the war that needs constantly debating.
